name: Danakk04's 3D Playground
description:
I never made any 3D games, but this is where I experimented with any ideas I had! I never figured out how to do 3D movement properly so it's a bit funky, but see if you can explore the world anyway!

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys, Q to rotate anti-clockwise and E to rotate clockwise.

(I couldn't figure out how to make it relate to the way you face, so each input always sends you in the same direction. Whoops!

I've also added project files for another thing I made titled "3D Maze Test" which I might make "playable" at some point.
